item.title: Htmx Is the Future
item.description: - Many web applications use complex single-page applications, which can be inaccessible for some users and have high development costs.

item.title: Heisting $20M of Magic: The Gathering Cards in a Single Request
item.description: - An exploit was discovered in Magic: The Gathering Arena that allowed users to purchase millions of card packs for "free" using a user-controlled arithmetic overflow.

item.title: Build your own private WireGuard VPN with PiVPN
item.description: - PiVPN is a solution for remotely accessing home network devices without relying on cloud services or multiple apps for different devices.

item.title: Public Money, Public Code
item.description: - The campaign for "Public Money, Public Code" advocates for publicly financed software developed for the public sector to be made publicly available under a Free and Open Source Software license.

item.title: What is a Vector Database? (2021)
item.description: - Pinecone has launched a vector database that is designed to efficiently process data for AI models.

item.title: Element is one of fourteen messaging apps blocked by Central Indian Government
item.description: - The Central Indian Government has blocked 14 messaging apps, including Element, due to Section 69A of the Information Technology Act 2000.

item.title: The EARN IT bill is back. We've killed it twice, let's do it again
item.description: - The EARN IT bill has been reintroduced, aiming to scan messages and photos for child exploitation but raises concerns about potential impacts on encryption and free speech.

item.title: I found the best anagram in English (2017)
item.description: - The author constructed a listing of all the anagrams in Webster's Second International dictionary.

item.title: Journalist writes about discovering she'd been surveilled by TikTok
item.description: - A Financial Times journalist discovered that she had been surveilled by TikTok after ByteDance accessed her data through her TikTok account.

item.title: Unlimiformer: Long-Range Transformers with Unlimited Length Input
item.description: - Unlimiformer is a new long-range transformer model that can process an unlimited length input.
